dmca.title: Notice of Copyright Infringement by boy-kiss.com (64.5.52.206)
dmca.body:
To Whom It May Concern:

Please note that below-referenced copyright infringement notice does not
substantially comply with the required notification elements of the
Digital Millennium Copyright Act of 1998 ("DMCA").

Please note that we have not passed on the substantive merits of your
claim.

Please visit our web site at www.theplanet.com/legal.
 
Legal Response Team
THEPLANET.COM INTERNET SERVICES, INC. 

-----Original Message-----
From: Colin Snover [mailto:abuse@y-hosting.net] 
Posted At: Sunday, August 20, 2006 10:26 AM
Posted To: Legal Response
Conversation: Notice of Copyright Infringement by boy-kiss.com
(64.5.52.206)
Subject: Notice of Copyright Infringement by boy-kiss.com (64.5.52.206)


Greetings.

The Web site located at http://www.boy-kiss.com/ (which resolves to
64.5.52.206) is illegally using and distributing copyrighted material
from several of my clients.

List of infringing works that we have located on this site:

http://boy-kiss.com/baner/avs/2.jpg
http://boy-kiss.com/free/bank_img/big/191.jpg
http://boy-kiss.com/free/bank_img/big/151.jpg
http://boy-kiss.com/free/bank_img/big/150.jpg
http://boy-kiss.com/free/bank_img/big/107.jpg
http://boy-kiss.com/free/bank_img/big/73.jpg
http://boy-kiss.com/free/bank_img/big/72.jpg
http://boy-kiss.com/free/bank_img/big/65.jpg
http://boy-kiss.com/free/bank_img/big/59.jpg
http://boy-kiss.com/free/bank_img/big/46.jpg
http://boy-kiss.com/free/bank_img/big/24.jpg
http://boy-kiss.com/free/bank_img/big/17.jpg
http://boy-kiss.com/free/bank_img/big/9.jpg

This material being used by this Web site is not authorised by the
copyright owner, its agent, or the law. Under penalty of purgery, I have
been authorised by the owner of the copyright to act on their behalf
regarding this matter.

If further information is required, please contact me at this email
address. Otherwise, please remove the offending works immediately.

Thank you for your time,

--
Colin Snover
y!hosting Abuse
